SELECT C.TITLE title, C.FIRST_IMAGE firstImage, C.CATEGORY_CODE category, R.CONTENT content, R.CREATED_TIME createTime, I.FILE_URL fileUrl FROM TB_REVIEW R JOIN TB_CONTENT C ON C.CONTENT_ID = R.CONTENT_ID LEFT JOIN TB_CONTENT_IMG I ON C.CONTENT_ID = I.CONTENT_ID WHERE R.USER_NO = #{userNo}
SELECT C.TITLE title, C.FIRST_IMAGE firstImage FROM TB_FAVORITE F LEFT JOIN TB_CONTENT C ON F.CONTENT_ID = C.CONTENT_ID WHERE F.USER_NO = #{userNo}
